title: My publications
text:

title: Hello!
text:
I am Elías Del Pozo, a PhD candidate in Computer Science and Technology at University Carlos III of Madrid (UC3M), currently in the final year of my doctoral studies.
I obtained my Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, specializing in Computer Engineering, in 2019, and my Master’s Degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2020, both at UC3M. Since 2020, I have been part of the ARCOS research group.
My research interests include High Performance Computing (HPC), Computing Continuum, Internet of Things (IoT), and simulation of edge and fog environments. Throughout my PhD, I have published two articles in scientific journals, presented my work in more than five national conferences, and participated in four international conferences.
You can also see my CV.
